thread.title: Investment Bankers, Wall Street’s Postcrisis Heroes, Face Growth Puzzle

author: Liz Hoffman
title: Investment Bankers, Wall Street’s Postcrisis Heroes, Face Growth Puzzle
text:
Investment bankers have had a good run. What now?
These Wall Street elite, who broker corporate mergers and underwrite stock and bond sales, have been their firms’ star performers over the past few years, aided by a bull market that encouraged companies to do deals and a sea of cheap debt to finance them.
But growth will likely get tougher...
